Southern Railway Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 3518 Apprentice Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 26, 2025, 10:33 IST
 Southern Railway
 3,518 Jobs |  Posted On : 26-Aug-2025 |  Tamil Nadu |  Salary : 6,000 to 7,000




FOLLOW

South Western Railway has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for the 3518 Apprentice Positions. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, ITI can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the Southern Railway Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Tamil Nadu.

Southern Railway Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Apprentice 	3518	10th Pass, ITI

Age Limit for the Southern Railway Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 15 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 24 years.

Age Relaxation

OBC (NCL) Candidates: 3 Years
SC, ST Candidates: 5 Years
PwBD Candidates: 10 Years
PwBD (OBC (NCL)) Candidates: 13 Years
PwBD (SC, ST) Candidates: 15 Years

Selectio Process for the Southern Railway Recruitment 2025

Merit List

Salary Structure for the Southern Railway Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 6,000 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 7,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the Southern Railway Recruitment 2025

All Other Candidates: Rs. 100/-
SC/ST/PwBD/Women Candidates: Nil
How to Apply for the Southern Railway Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Apprentice Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Register with your email and password.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Pay the application fee (if applicable).
Submit the application form and capture the application number for further usage.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	25-08-2025
Last Date of Application	25-09-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
